feed.title: Mirosław Leśniak, abstract art and poetry
feed.description: Surfers are slaves to the ocean.

entry.title: New blog and the old blog
entry.content:
The old one ran out of space :((
https://vlepy.github.io

entry.title: Abstract 188
Głód (PL)
entry.content:
Będziecie uprawiać ziemię
Ale ziemia nie da plonów
Nastanie głód
Głód którego się boicie tak bardzo
Zobaczycie śmierć swoich bliskich
Weźmiecie w garści ziemię i zaczniecie szukać Boga
Znajdziecie go
A on odpowie na wasze modlitwy
Będziecie szukać mesjasza
A mesjasz nadejdzie
Będziecie wdzięczni
Jak nigdy dotąd

entry.title: Hunger
entry.content:
You will cultivate land
But the land will give no crops
There will be hunger
Hunger you frighten so much
You will see your loved dying
And you will grab the soil and you will start seeking for God
You will find Him
He will answer your prayers
You will seek for Messiah
And the Messiah will come
You will be thankfull
Like never before

entry.title: Abstract 189
Abstract 189b
New World
entry.content:
Mirosław Leśniak

New World RPG scenario



New Beginning


The Earth as we knew it is no more, cataclysms like earthquakes, floods, fires, hurricanes, wars destroyed all the governments and killed most population, most satellites fell into atmosphere and burned. There is a blue orb orbiting the moon at night, no one knows what it is. Some people have powers now that used to be called magic.

You’re a bunch of crazy, young people that don’t know The World Before The End, you travel from town to town on the North USA Black Wasteland ruins looking for jobs, your hometown is Scrap, placed in an old junkyard, leaded and guarded by a master in robotics: Sid. His robots defend the town and provide services in it. You’re:


Trax:

Beginner pyromancer: Can start fire of an object by touching it. Carries a Glock 9mm. In future he’ll be able to throw fireballs or start walls of fire. Very charismatic, handsome guy, leader of the group. Very good speaker. Knows English and Russian.


Senpai:

Gun freak. He might be only twenty two however his hair are gray. He tries to be a master in firearms. Carries a Magnum 44, he has a car and a Remington sniper rifle in the back trunk. Knows the most about guns among the group. OK mechanic.


Zip:

A young thief. Short guy, 165cm tall, always carries a lock picking tools and a robotic rope with a hook which he is very good with, also carries a 9mm Glock in case his agility fails. Climbs and swims well.


Siegfried:

Knife and sword maniac. Carries a katana, throws knives, sometimes cuts his own skin for fun when he’s bored. Very fast runner that can jump far. Practices parkour. Silent killer. Catholic. Black.


They are near to be broke, they have only 24 tix altogether.


Sid (me) sometimes provides help by lending his robots for a fair amount of Tix.


He offers a humanoid, armored, punching humanoid robot fro lend for 20 tix, a small, wheeled scout robot for 20 tix + 20tix if armed with a c4 bomb it can plant or detonate and a track based cargo robot for 20 tix. If a robot wont be returned that’s extra 20 tix penalty.


The main town store offers few 9mm guns, 9mm ammo, gas masks, wound healing injections, antibiotics, military grade food, fuel, noctovision googles, batteries, flares.


One day there is a guest showing up in Scrap looking for people that will get him to the Rubber Forest. Rubber forest is one of the places on this wasteland considered dangerous, some sketchy people go into it for unknown reasons, some people that went there never came back, some came back wounded or robbed, some were fine but everyone says it’s not a good spot.

The guy says his name is Ernie, he’s a long haired 52 years old white man, and he needs an escort to get there and talk to someone, it’s really important but he can’t tell more. He offers 100 tix for the job. This would fix your financial needs for a week or two. He rides a rusty Harley Davidson and carries a shotgun.

Ernie needs to talk to the leader of the Wasteland Devils, a gang controlling that part of The Black Wasteland. He has a serious message. Earnie is an advanced user of telepathy and kinetic forces. He can far see, receive and send messages in mind on medium distances and move medium objects with kinetic powers. However Rubber Forest is way too dangerous to go alone.


Road to Rubber Forest


The road to the Rubber Forest is a day long ride in a car through Black Rock desert. Very little plants grow around here. Team has to get fuel from the Junkyard and pay for it. It’s 0.1 Tix per liter. On their way to the Junkyard they encounter a smoking car wreck on the road. Two burned corpses inside. Seems like a Russian UFO activity, the car looks like destroyed by a laser cannon. They better be careful for the aircrafts around. They also pass by The Black Skull Lake, there is a small woods nearby and the water isn’t contaminated much, some fish still swim, few rabbits wander around the woods, they can be eaten. There are few abandoned boats with broken engines at the shore. They can be repaired and fueled. On the center of the lake they can find a small island with a crashed old helicopter wreck where they can find an abandoned bag containing 43 tix and a SIG Sauer 9mm gun with a full magazine; the gun requires cleaning.

There is a single water mutant sleeping on the island, he’s harmless and frightened on the land, he will try running and splashing into the water when he see them, but, if they manage to give him a fish he will hand them a gold nugget, worthless in this times. Seems the area is gold rich. He’s an excellent swimmer and can drag people to the bottom of the lake in the waters if they decide to swim a bit. All he can say is „Greg”, apparently his name.

Around this time a sudden fog comes. It’s a little toxic, causes coughing. The team will see can see a car approaching with one light working. People who ride it are three armed Wasteland Devils.

Outside their hideout they are hostile, armed robbers. That’s how they supply the Rubber Forest. They all wear read leather jackets and blue jeans. One of them wears kevlar. They might decide to attack the team if they consider they have advantage. If they think otherwise or start loosing combat, they will try escaping back to the Rubber Forest in their car. If they manage to escape they might make more gangsters come and rob the team. The fog will remain till the end of the day and during night.


The Rubber Forest


Basically it’s a large old tire waste disposal. When I mean large I mean gigantic. No one knows where it comes from. When team comes there is still fog around. Wasteland Devils live inside, between piles of rubber. The main entrance where the road ends is being observed with CCTV hidden in piles of rubber. Ernie can sense that with his far seeing. Wasteland Devils know this area very well, people that enter it are constantly watched and tracked. They will attack only if players get into one of their traps, however they will first speak before they attack, they will try to find out who they’re dealing with and what are they up to. The area is large but there is only below thirty people living in it. Lots of crows around. They most likely, eventually will be caught into a trap, disarmed and taken into custody then brought to the center of Rubber Forest. To the boss.


The Wasteland Devil


The place is made of several buildings made of sheet metal built around a camp fire where two women seem cooking a soup. They can here chickens crackling, pigs grunting and few dogs barking. The Devils say "you’ll end up here!” and point at several cages on stakes next to the fire, there is a human locked in one of the cages, seems sleeping. Then they throw them into the cages. It’s early night. Zip is able to open the cage when no one watches him. Trax can convince the women to talk with him. Earnie keeps on saying he wants to talk to the boss and he has a message to the boss. When the other prisoner wakes up it turns out he speak only Russian, Trax is able to talk with him. His name is Vanya, he says he’s a pilot of an aircraft that crashed, he tried getting help here but got into custody, they don’t want to let him out, he’s here for weeks already. He says that the boss is not a human and creeps him out. That brings gloomy mood to the rest of the team. If they talk in cages too much the guards will turn electricity on and the cages will shock them with electricity.

On the morning every Devil gathers before the largest building in town in a row. The boss comes out from the building. He’s a short humanoid with a really big head, moves slowly, his skin is grey, eyes large, fingers long. There are several glowing objects levitating around his large head. He puts a mask on, turns out to be a communication device. Earnie instantly yells: „A13C! Zenith want you back!”. The alien freezes for thirty seconds. Through his communication device he says „let them out but don’t give their equipment back”. Then he quickly gets back to the building of his.


Zenith


The only remaining space station. Tricky place to get in, very little people know how, no one that wasn’t there know what's in it. But every one knows it’s there, that’s large white light moving through the night sky. They say it’s the last hope for humanity but that’s only one of the legends. Apparently A13C and Earnie know more.


Way Further


Tbc…

entry.title: Abstract 190
Vampire
entry.content:
Ow screw you guy
That’s not nice
You fell down
Freaked out
You’re like vampire
With pretty eyes
Look at you now
You fell down
No crime committed
With the computer
Tho it’s not super
Life is bit cruel
Hope God’s forgiving
It isn’t easy
With your believing
We will be free

entry.title: Shadow
entry.content:
She’s like a shadow
Always present
Sometimes I don’t even notice
But she’s always with me
People make me forget her
So i don’t think about her
She makes my life ugly
Her name is poverty

entry.title: Autoportrait 5
Abstract 191
Abstract 192
Dance Macabre
entry.content:
Lands that are taken
Are occupied
For thousand years
Was Palestine
Trying to fight
The old oppressor
With drastic measures
With violent terror

No running water
Someone is dying
Bomb is exploding
A girl is crying
Counter attacking
With carpet bombing
Buildings are burning
The tanks are coming

entry.title: Abstract 193
Night rains
entry.content:
When rain drops
The winds blow
When blizzard strikes
Or heat is upon
Birds chirp
Cows moo
And dogs bark
No one wants lonely people

entry.title: Hell
entry.content:
Eternal fire
Burning your skin
Constant suffering
For all of your sins
It is your fault
You wanted be born
Now that you died
All of it is done
For what purpose
One and one is two
Don’t be a horse
Know what to do
It’s not your fault
The world is cruel
You piece of shit
You went to hell

entry.title: Abstract 194
World
entry.content:
This cursed world
Is so damn empty
Im almost none
I keep on hating
I despise it
And it’s with passion
Why not a little
Annihilation
Those walking bags
Of meat and water
I need some drugs
So i don’t suffer
But they keep telling
It’s not that good
Methylophenidate
I like your mood

entry.title: Fala
entry.content:
ludzie w tym kraju mają takie przywileje a często wybierają bycie chujami
zamiast czynić dobro
po to nam kurwa wolność
i znowu jesteśmy jebani
ja na przykład zostałem właśnie wyjebany z kanału
przez falowca z lat 90tych
chuj mu w dupę
jebany falowiec
od tego są
od jebania ludzi
kurwa echa przeszłości
powinni ich wszystkich zastrzelić przed 2010
stalin by tak zrobił
bo teraz są kurwa szkodliwi
bo terror lat 90tych się skończył
a oni nadal jebią ludzi
bo kurwa nic innego nie potrafią
może zorganizować dla nich kursy origami
może to ich jakoś zajmie
są jak czerwoni
trzymają się stołków jak pijawki
jak w latach dwudziestych można dać falowcowi władzę
szaleństwo
to jest burdel z odrobiną terroru
żeby kurwa w 2023 w polsce ludzi jebano
to jest szczyt
wychodzę z ircneta
tylko szaleniec ich teraz popiera
przez nich tutaj nadal nic się kupy nie trzyma

a swoją drogą jeśli nie ma lekarzy zmieńmy szpitale w centra handlowe lub je wyburzmy
a ja zostanę szamanem
i git.

entry.title: Abstract 195
Backdoors
entry.content: I think people should be more aware about backdoor problem in modern era. I am among hackers for at least 15 years now, we find knowledge about backdoors common. From time to time, trough industry media there are going large and bigger affairs exposing backdoors in often crucial, secure software and hardware components of digital devices. At the same time people rely more and more on the electronic devices and keep crucial information on those devices, unaware of the danger. What’s different than 15 years ago is the scale of the problem. For me it started with the infamous OpenBSD IPSec backdoor. That made me aware backdoors in open source projects happen. That changed my perception. Then large affairs like Heart Bleed or Spectre that exposed „bugs” that were really backdoors implemented by the manufacturers, patched afterwards because the industry pressure. I bet they implemented new backdoors afterwards. It depends who you are and what you do, not that much what software you pick, now day. Microsoft makes different keys for different sectors and countries changing slightly how Windows behaves. Linux and Apple betrays their users. Android is a joke. Everything basically compromised. It seems that paper survived the test of the time.

entry.title: Abstract 196
Abstract 197
Abstract 198
Mistakes
entry.content:
No one likes to be mistaken
So things need to be created
Some will never let it go
Whatever it takes to be on top
My parents thought they’re much better
Never did admit they’re mistaken
If only they knew they’re wrong
My life would not be so broke

entry.title: Abstract 199
Abstract 199b
Nature
entry.content:
I dream about her sometimes
She is long gone
Migrated out to live different life
Among the others
I am old now, seen her eight years ago
There was no need
No need to migrate out
I stayed
So I am here
Alone
Getting older and older
And they just laugh
Laugh because our fate
Victim of politics
Like a gunmetal sculpture
Eventually forgotten
As all dead become
In clash with eternity
Just I can scream
In hope to be heard
But no one that hears
Cares
Just like concrete around me
Or the grave of my father
They just remain
Until they get demolished
And no one cares again
Because the nature of this world

entry.title: Raw Beef
entry.content:
Solutions that backfire
Shattered families
Everyone moves out
Who stayed doesn’t care
Drugs in school
Girls with no boys
Boys with no girls
Surrounded by strangers
Building life again
Broken societies
Broken lives
No clue what’s going down
Becoming alone
Becoming ill
No school finished
At hospitals in isolation
Eventually stigmatized
Waiting for death

entry.title: Sun
entry.content:
Endless forests where the deer feed
Lakes full of fish
Plains of flowers and bees
Birds flying in the sky
Winds moving the leaves
Silent grave of a damned soul
Bathing in rains
Sun above it all

entry.title: Hop
entry.content:
Hop hammer hitting my head
Bubbles in my belly
I count if I love her it’s enough
I love her and it’s too little
Her eyes smarter than ever
She is inteligent as hell
I better be silent
I worry she reads this
Darkness around me
Being saved by a silly lightbulb
Her eyes stalking me
I just cannot forget
Her eyes getting me
Blue strike of beauty
Blue strike of intelligence
Killing me to death

entry.title: Abstract 200
Shining
entry.content:
Like a lame dog
On a wide meadow
No one to ask for
A bowl of fodder
In a winter night
After years of exile
I howl to the moon
Shining in the sky

entry.title: Faulty
entry.content:
I’m sorry Rainbow
We know it’s not day one
I’m sorry Flower
This stuff just happens
So I yell into void
There is no echo
Absolute emptiness
It’s like I have to
Acts full of shame
Is all I got
They say it’s hell
For I just done
I hurt myself
This isn’t healthy
That’s what I’ve learnt
It makes me faulty

entry.title: Horses
entry.content:
Crushes from old days
Shiny horses
Meadows of grass
Stores where you can buy anything
It’s just she always tries to get away
When I call her
She’s elsewhere
And I wake up

entry.title: Ambulance
entry.content:
I need love ambulance
Riding through roads
Doing it’s duty
Saving lives
When it’s cold outside
Inside not that much
When loneliness strikes
And you’re out of luck
Just call 112
No need to be shy
You’ll get ambulance
Chilling you out
The love vehicle
Because it’s needed
Totally available
Even on weekends

entry.title: Abstract 201
(PL) Czerwony
entry.content:
W sercu Warszawy
Wiele dekad temu
W betonowym budynku
Zbrojonym stalą
Siedział czerwony skurwiel
Był tak czerwony
Że inni się go bali
Upewniał się
Że żaden Polak
Nie będzie dzisiaj głodny
Że każde dziecko
Będzie miało buty
Że w barze mleczym
Zjesz znowu WZ
Że na kwadracie
Pójdziesz spokojnie spać

entry.title: Red
entry.content:
In the heart of Warsaw
Many decades back
In a concrete building
Enforced by steel
There was a red motherfucker
So red
That others frightened him
He made sure
That no Pole
Will be hungry today
That every child
Will have shoes
That in the milk bar
You’ll have WZ again
That in your apt
There will be fine rest

entry.title: Abstract 202
Abstract 202b
Abstract 203
Abstract 203b
Abstract 204
Abstract 204b
Tiger
entry.content:
Once wise man said
Sayonara
Sensei!
This sets me in zen state
Like a tiger
Im gonna make pictures
Apply for a passport
And get on a plane

entry.title: Abstract 205
Ashes
entry.content:
My soul demands
Liquid spirit
And gray ghost
So I can consume my ashes
Walking dead
Standing wraith
In the mirror
An unknown alien

entry.title: Abstract 206
Abstract 207
Hornets
entry.content:
We’ll build a new home
With lies, money and violence
And it will be ours
Full of comfy furniture
And we’ll make cloths
All of us will wear them
Who’ll not will be punished
With hornets
And there will be no music
Girls wont dance with anyone
But there will be spirit
Rivers of it
And everyone will believe
Disbelievers will lie
Like people with oil motors
Or electric vehicles

entry.title: (PL) Szerszenie
entry.content:
Zbudujemy nowy dom
Kłamstwami, przemocą i pieniędzmi
I będzie nasz
Pełen wygodnych mebli
I zrobimy ubrania
Wszyscy będziemy je nosić
Kto nie, zostanie ukarany
Szerszeniami
I nikt nie zagra muzyki
Dziewczyny nie zatańczą z byle kim
Ale będzie duch
Całe jego rzeki
I każdy uwierzy
Kto nie, skłamie
Jak ludzie z silnikami spalinowymi
Czy elektrycznymi pojazdami

entry.title: Abstract 208
Abstract 208b
Pond
entry.content:
night skies of lights
steel elephants
fireworks
like new year's eve
day like every day
concrete buildings
being blown up
someone drowning in a pond
jets throwing fire
lead flying left and right
getting trough barbed wire
to accompish your task
noise and smell
everywhere
boots full of mud
just during that day

entry.title: Flowers
entry.content:
one pretty flower
got stomped by heavy boots
another pretty flower
got killed by toxic waste
and on this meadow
these things are normal
on this meadow
only weeds survive
the air is full of pollution
where the flowers grow
they build large stores
because they profit
and very soon
no one will remember
how the flowers bloomed
and bees were flying

entry.title: Misfortunes
entry.content:
the machine is working
gears rotating
engines vrooming
chips calculating
the clock is ticking
so everyone knows
how many misfortunes
there is per minute
so everyone knows
one better than other
but ultimately
no one cares anyway
another day comes
routine repeats itself
until people die
and new replace them

entry.title: Places
entry.content:
A young woman
Walking away
In sandals
On a sunny day
Through a dusty road
In shade of majestic trees
Toward an ancient building
Her green silk dress
And her hijab
Let the air go trough
So she does not mind
The heat of the day
It’s a place
I never been at
It seems so calm
And peaceful

entry.title: (PL) Odrodzony
entry.content:
Odrodziłem się pośród kwitnących kwiatów
Kwitnely spcjalnie na tę okazję
Kiedy skowronki śpiewały
Zostałem złożony
Złożony z ziemi, powietrza i wody
Tchnięty życiem przez miłość Boga
A słońce było pełne wiary i nadziei
A moje oczy otworzyły się ponownie
Więc podziękowałem Bogu pełnią serca
I uderzyło mnie szczęście
Z powodu wszystkich wspaniałych ludzi
I serca wypełniła radość
Jako akt niebiańskiej mądrości
Żyję ponownie
W świecie lepszym niż kiedykolwiek
Dzięki niebiańskiej mądrości

entry.title: Reborn
entry.content:
I got reborn in blooming flowers
They bloomed just for this occasion
While skylarks were chirping
I got assembled
Assembled out of soil, air and water
Brought to life by the love of God
And the sun was full of faith and hope
And my eyes opened again
So I thanked God with full heart
And got stroked by happiness
Because of all the wonderful people
And all hearts got filled with joy
As an act of celestial wisdom
I live again
In a world better then ever
Thanks to celestial wisdom

entry.title: Mandate
entry.content:
They elected him to power
With one voice
And everything was fine
But the foreigner appeared
He noticed boss has no sense of humor
Boss didn’t know why they’re laughing
So he got angry
He forbidden laughter at all
Started making threats
Presented weapons
Applied terror
No one said nothing
So i looked away for three seconds
When I looked back the boss was dead
They agreed with one voice
Foreigner can’t see how he dies

entry.title: Hyperlogical
entry.content:
Neither good nor evil
Neither dead nor alive
Always unique
Usually pretty
Impossible to predict
Possible to be shaped
Manifasting itself
Ready to be discovered
Always intriguing
So enrichive
Gives birth to uncanny
Hyperlogical
Reasoning own rules
Fun
Unexpected
Stunning

entry.title: Weapons
entry.content:
yeah you know
if there is a war i'd consider using weapons
but i'm no expert
thats just my humble opinion
no one ever listens to me anyway
maybe worth to ask artificial intelligence
or maybe pope will know
some people in case of dilemas like to write letters to teenage magazines
some people use tarot cards
there are many approaches to get this solved
i personally base my world view on wikipedia
but i'm always open to debate
ok so there is a plan
in the golden age of television they used to make public probes on the street
you'd be suprised what mister Zenek the janitor says
no one ever knew because no one ever asks him for opinion
and the guy has some golden ideas
worth writing down
of course it's so immoral to judge
but is this for sure
maybe your wife has a hint too
there is plenty of possibilities

entry.title: Bees
entry.content:
flowers waiting for bees
cars going around
people walking their way
fresh coffee in a cafeteria
someone cutting the grass
a man taking rest in a park
a child being born in a hospital
night full of stars
air conditioning cooling the air
workers producing steel
a scientist breaking a cipher
someone paying their bills
old woman praying in a church
train getting to the station on time
fresh apples at a marketplace
it smells like armageddon

entry.title: No Kangaroo
entry.content:
freezing cold
blinding dark
hard concrete
no way out
love
is what i know
virtues of life
daemons all around
just like others
mortal
playing with fire
to warm us up
getting burned
the body hurts
goodbye all
there is no kangaroo

entry.title: (PL) Super Zuzia
entry.content:
Gdy wiatr wieje
Gdy niepogoda
Gdy deszcz się sączy
I nastrój spada
Jest Super Zuzia
Na wszystkie troski
Rozwieje chmury
Rozbawi buźki
Jej ciężka praca
Tym z czego znana
Z pogody ducha
Z tego, że mama
Kochamy Zuzię
Za to co robi
Gdyby nie ona
Świat by się zgubił

entry.title: (PL) Dar
entry.content:
Nie złote góry
Czy sława
Nawet drogie auta
Ani Jachty
I prywatne samoloty
Także luksusowe domy
Miłość
Jest tym czego brak mi najbardziej
Kochać
I być kochanym
Miłość błogosławieństwem
Wolą życia
Tajemnicą
Cnotą
Skarbem
Miłość jest darem

entry.title: (PL) Światło
entry.content:
Kiedy są kłopoty
Wszystko się sypie
Twoje życie podupada
Coraz bardziej
Dostrzegam
Że jest światło
Światło które lśni
Od zawsze
Światło któremu można ufać
I za nim podążać
Światło które życzy dobrze
Nam wszystkim
Nie przestaje lśnić
Jak wieczna latarnia
Upewnię ciebie
Że dotrzesz do domu bezpiecznie

entry.title: (PL) Zagrożenie
entry.content:
Kiedy orły w przestworzach
Króliki są zagrożone
Kiedy je złapią
Zabijają
A trawa rośnie
Wiatr wieje
Słońce lśni
I deszcz pada

entry.title: (PL) Okno
entry.content:
W tym pokoju
Jest nas kilku
Dzielimy powietrze
Powietrze pełne dymu
Co pozwala nam oddychać
To uchylone okno
Kliknięcia zapalniczek
przerywają ciszę
Każdy je traktuje
Jak skarb
Bez nich
Nie ma ognia
Ludzie wchodzą
I wychodzą
A ja nie znajduję tu
Spełnienia

entry.title: (PL) Marzenia
entry.content:
Stracone marzenia
Stracone plany
Każdy ma to gdzieś
Używają siły
Jak rozbite okno
Zniewolony poeta
Nòż w serce
Łza w ciemności
Pisanie aby pisaċ
Pisanie aby przetrwać
Aby istnieć
I to uzasadnić
Na koniec Bóg pamięta
Spiż tego nie zmieni
Obróci się w proch
Jak wszystko inne

entry.title: (PL) Srebro
entry.content:
Widok szczęścia
przyjmuję z miłością
Widok strachu
Budzi u mnie smutek
Więc przemierzam morza
Wielkie, nieznane
Spotykam piękne duszki
I ohydne monstra
I to morze
Zostanie ukarane
To morze
Wymienia dusze na srebro
Wbrew woli Boga
Wbrew siłom natury
Wbrew człowieczeństwu
Ostatecznie: biada

entry.title: (PL) Rzym
entry.content:
Przez rozległe równiny
Pustynie gdzie wody brak
Lasy gdzie jeleń żyje
Miasta z betonu
Poprzez przewody sieci
Potężne góry
I morskie wybrzeża
I tak dotrzesz do Rzymu

entry.title: (PL) Grób
entry.content:
Zostawiony na śmierć
Nikt się nie modli
Mój grób już czeka
Ma grawerunek mojego imienia
Dół w ziemi
Świetnie mnie pomieści
Grabarze
Znają się na robocie
Mój mały pomnik
Zostanie zapomniany
Nikt nie zapali świeczki
Czy nie położy kwiatów
To grób przez niesprawiedliwość
Stworzony przez złych
Stworzony ostrożnie
Dla ich własnej wygody

entry.title: Gift
entry.content:
Not golden mountains
Nor fame
Even expensive cars
Neither party boats
And no private jets
No luxury houses
Love
Is what I lack most
To love
And to be loved
Love is a blessing
Will of life
A secret
A virtue
A treasure
Love is a gift

entry.title: Light
entry.content:
When there is trouble
Everything falls apart
Your life is getting worse
And worse
I realize
There is a light
Light that shines
Since ever
Light you can put trust in
And follow
Light that wishes you well
For all of us
It keeps on shining
Like an eternal lighthouse
It assures you
You’ll get home safe

entry.title: Danger
entry.content:
When the eagles fly
Rabbits are in danger
When they catch them
They kill them
And the grass grows
The wind blows
Sun shines
And rain drops

entry.title: Window
entry.content:
In this room
There is few of us
We share air
Air full of smoke
What lets us breathe
Is an open window
The clicks of lighters
Break the silence
Everyone treats them
Like a treasure
Without them
There is no fire
People get in
And out
And I don’t get
Fulfilled over there

entry.title: Dream
entry.content:
Lost dreams
Lost plans
No one cares
Force is being used
Like a shattered window
Like an enslaved poet
Knife to a heart
A tear in the dark
Writing to write
Writing to survive
To exist
And to justify it
In the end God remembers
No gunmetal will change it
It will perish
Like the rest of it all

entry.title: Silver
entry.content:
The look of happiness
I take with love
The look of fear
I take with sorrow
So I sail all the seas
The great unknowns
I meet beautiful spirits
And awful monsters
And this sea
Will be punished
This sea
Trades souls for silver
Against the will of god
Against forces of nature
Against humanity
Eventually: woe

entry.title: Rome
entry.content:
Through wide meadows
Deserts with no water
Forests where the deer live
Cities of concrete
Via wires of web
Mountains of might
And the shores of the seas
Rome is where you end up

entry.title: Grave
entry.content:
Left to die
No one is praying
The grave awaits
My name already there
The hole in the ground
Will fit me well
The gravediggers
Do excellent job
That little monument
Will be forgotten
No one will light a candle
Or put flowers on it
It’s a grave because injustice
Created by evil men
Created carefully
For their own convenience

entry.title: (PL) Bracie
entry.content:
Trzy tygodnie
Kilka dalej
Co tu począć
Powiedz bracie
Bracie powiedz
Nie pamiętasz
Gdy mnie widzisz
Gardzisz
W tym budynku
Widzę wielu
Wielu których
Tylko Bóg pamięta
To zasmuca
Moją duszę
W chwili pragnę
Paść na kolana

entry.title: Brother
entry.content:
Three weeks past
Few weeks more
What to do
Tell me brother
Brother tell me
Why you forgot
When you see me
You despise me
In this building
I see many
Many that
Only God remembers
That brings sorrow
To my soul
And I want to
Fall on my knees

entry.title: (PL) Planeta
entry.content:
Dzieci na łące
Biegają w koło
Cieszą się głośno
Na świat przyszły
Planeta jest inna
Jest po problemach
Ludzie wspólnie
Radośni pracują
Pokój wszędzie
Podbój kosmosu
Narody świata
Kooperują
Wiedza dla wszystkich
Nikt nie jest głodny
Człowiek wart więcej
Niż twe pieniądze

entry.title: Planet
entry.content:
Children on meadow
Running around
Laughing a lot
Their life begun
The Planet is different
All problems gone
People along
Happy and working
Peace everywhere
Space exploration
Nations of World
Cooperating
Knowledge for all
No one is hungry
Human is worth
More than your money

entry.title: (PL) Lis
entry.content:
Kiedyś lis
Chciał kurczaka
Wszedł do kurnika
I zabił kurczaka
Farmer był zły
Ulepszył zagrodę
I od tej pory
Kurczaki były bezpieczne
Ale lis
Chciał kurczaka
I jednej nocy
Księżyc lśnił
Lis wykopał dół
Przeszedł pod zagrodą
Wszedł do kurnika
I zabił kurczaka

entry.title: Fox
entry.content:
Once a fox
Wanted a chicken
Got into a hen house
And killed a chicken
Farmer was angry
Made his fence better
So since then
Chickens were safe
But the fox
Wanted a chicken
And one night
Moon shined
Fox dug a hole
Got under the fence
Went into the hen house
And killed a chicken

entry.title: (PL) Powietrze
entry.content:
Coś jest w powietrzu
Wiesz, chemikalia
Zapachy
Pyły
Kiedy deszcz spada
Powietrze wilgotnieje
Góry erodują
Przez milenia
Ściany się walą
Ale drzewa rosną
Natura przejmuje kontrolę
Od zawsze
Stoimy pośrodku tego
Malując ściany
Wtedy
Kiedy się zabrudzą

entry.title: Air
entry.content:
Something’s in the air
Chemicals, you know
Scents
Pollens
When the rain drops
Air gets more humid
Mountains erode
Over millennia
Walls break
But trees grow
Nature takes over
Since ever
We stand among it all
Painting the walls
When
They get dirty
